alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Marion; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 3:11AM CDT until June 17 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Shelby County in northeastern Missouri... Marion County in northeastern Missouri... Lewis County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 311 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Colony to near Steffenville to Shelbina, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Emden around 320 AM CDT. Ewing around 325 AM CDT. Warren around 330 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Maywood, La Grange and Canton. This also includes Wakonda State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
